author: Staff Reporter
text:
A list of deleted names from electoral roll will be displayed at all polling stations on Wednesday for public verification.

Polling officials will discuss issues with representatives of political parties, booth agents and officials concerned at respective polling stations, according to Collector T.N. Hariharan.

In a press release issued here on Tuesday, he said that representatives of political parties and booth agents could take part in the meeting and give suggestions to prepare an error-free electoral roll.

Names of deceased persons and migrants were detected and removed from the list as per the direction of the Election Commission, he added.
title: Names deleted in poll roll to be displayed
